title: rp boost...
body: i had 250 rp befor i played one for all.so i start play one for all and unlock skin boost and somone left and i didnt get my rp back...So do somthing with it pleas acc name VoyBoy Crs

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Please drop us a line [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). We'll be able to take a look at your account and make any necessary adjustments.
Leave a ticket with riot supp they really good at fixing it fast
